channel.title: Whonix: Are there any list of useful profiles?
channel.description:
Hello Users,
is there a list of profiles to install and put in enforce mode besides the ones already implemented? And in which whonix qubes is which profile useful?
I'm thinking for example of whonix-firewall and home.tor-browser-firefox, which I have installed and enabled, in all whonix qubes.
Thank you for opinions!

item.title: Whonix: Are there any list of useful profiles?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Only the profiles already mentioned in the wiki.

Whonix – 26 Jan 22

Information Booster might be Available!

Utilizing other resources to help solve questions/issues unspecific to Whonix ™.

Read full topic
item.source: Whonix: Are there any list of useful profiles?
